column2: A Scop is a form of Anglo-Saxon bard, who is a favored entertainer in the rulers' court.
The Helm is a chosen protector of the ruler, and a valued confidant in times of trouble.
A Folcwine is a friend of the people, and it is a honor to be considered so by the ruler.
The Sigecempa is an incredible honor, being the victorious champion of your people.
The people of the Holy Roman Empire speak a variety of Germanic languages. The creation of a single, unfied Germanic language could be a frst step in a Pan-Germanic Ideology.
This character is a cruel tyrant, subjugating the people, and reaping the rewards.
This character is a cruel tyrant, subjugating the people, and reaping the rewards.
This kingdom is ruling normally, without the aid of tyranny.
This kingdom is ruled with an iron fist, angering the people but instilling fear into many.
Organize the Scholae Palatinae, an elite corps of guardsmen.
Organize the Excubitors, an elite guard recruiting from the barbarians to the East, from sturdy Isaurians to swift Arabs, it will be a powerful shield of the Empire.
Rebuild and rennovate the crumbling Circus Maximus.
The Blues are the chariot team for the nobility, centered on courtly intrigue and diplomacy.
The Greens are the chariot team for the working class, violent and hardworking are perfect words to describe Green fans.
he Blues are the chariot team for the nobility, centered on courtly intrigue and diplomacy.
The Greens are the chariot team for the working class, violent and hardworking are perfect words to describe Green fans.
Merchants from the East have brought a great disease to this province.
This character has the dreaded Byzantine Plague.
The Isbeilors are a tightly knit group of Armorican raiders, who wield a large spear and shield.
Praesidium is a guard station, that is manned by trained legionaries, a form of heavily armed infantry.
The Castellum is a small fort, designed to hold a small body of men.
The Castra is the standard military base for the Roman Empire, holding many legionaries, these camps were commonplace throughout the Empire.
The Castra Stativa is a more permament, larger version of the Castra used in situations were more men and protection are needed.
The Forum is the heart of any Roman city, and is a center of business and trade.
Restore the Roman Infrastructure in Italia.
Ask the ruler of Tolosa for trade in the Seven Provinces.
End the bustling trade in the Seven Provinces.
This provinces is experiencing open trade, causing an influx of cultures, religions, and wealth into the area.
The trade routes in this provinces are not very safe, causing many merchants to travel in fear, if they do at all.
Ask the ruler of Paris for trade in the Lugdunensis.
A Quarantine is Placed on your Realm...
Establish a Quarantine on your realm, slowing the spread of disease.
End the Quarantine you have placed on your realm.
Establish a Quaranta on all trade posts in you nation, preventing the spread of disease through merchant ships.
This character is currently in charge of a realm wide Quarantine.
The people in this province are experiencing a Quarantine, banning foreigners, placing curfews, and isolating those with disease symptoms.
All ships entering the trade post in this province must now wait for 40 days before then having the ship checked to enter this port.
Ask if the Pope may recognize you as the legitimate successor to the Western Roman Empire.
Ask the Eastern Emperor to grant you the crown of the Western Roman Empire.
Establish a Binitarian Patriarchy in Jerusalem.
Establish a church system for the Ebionites
I can drive the Fist of Hubal from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...
Donate 300¤ to the Fist of Hubal
I can donate money to the Fist of Hubal in exchange for [Player.Religion.GetPietyName] and lifelong respect from the Semitic Priesthood.
A Holy Tree has been found in this province, making it a center of theological discussion.
This character is known as a particularly pious ruler, being always attentful towards the needs of the faith.
As he is your prisoner, you may give the order to sacrifice [Root.GetTitledFirstName] to the ancient gods.
This character has held a mass animal sacrifice according to the ancient traditions of the Alamannians.
Perform an mass animal sacrifice according to the traditions of the Alamannian people.
If I am pious enough and control Rome, I can create a Valentinian Ecumenical Patriarch to serve as the head of the faith
has been anoited with the oil and water.
The Apellian school of Marcionism is centered on Gnostic and Eastern traditions.
The Potitian school of Marcionism is the mainstream school, and follows the teachings of Marcion.
The Synerian school sells out many of the Gnostic and heretical elements of the faith in order to gain approval from other Christians.

column3: The Apellian school of Marcionian theology. As revealed to Apellius through a demon speaking through the woman Philumene, the Apellian school is deeply settled in Gnostic rites.

column2: Potitianism is the mainstream school of Marcionism, and the form advocated by Marcion himself.
The Synerian school removes most of the questionable content from the Marcionian creed, reorganizing themselves in a more Nicene approved manner.
Establish the institution of a High Patriarch.
As he is your prisoner, you may give the order to sacrifice [Root.GetTitledFirstName] to the ancient gods.
Denounce the religious writings known as the Three Chapters to potentially heal the schism between Monophysites and Chalcedonians.
By accepting conversion and backing the Aquileian church, you could potentially become more powerful.
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! can fund a major invasion of the land of §Y$TITLE$§!. If successful, the titles to all currently occupied holdings will be seized.
Khawariji, or "tose who went out" is a sect of Islam that arose from he rejection of Ali Ibn Abi Talib's rule in the Caliphate.
Haruriyyah is an early Muslim sect which was an offshoot branch of the Khariji Rectors. They took offense to the use of arbitrators in the Caliphate and had Ali murdered.
Abolish the Masmuda Confederacy, creating a centralized state ruled by your dynasty. Be warned though, this may launch a new age of tribal wars.
You are an Imazunen, or "Prophet" of your people, granting you great respect and prestige to you and your family.
The realm is in a state of Tamtruyt, leaving the government without power and a general anarchy throughout the realm.
This character is a member of the Nasrani Christian caste, highly prestigious in Indian society.
